channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: No Matter How Hard Democrats Try, There Is No Such Thing As ‘Biblical Evidence’ For Abortion
item.description: Just because Jesus didn’t specifically use the word ‘abortion’ in his short ministry on Earth doesn’t mean he endorses it.

item.title: A Pathway to Amnesty
item.description: This latest attempt at comprehensive immigration reform is a cure worse than the disease.

item.title: Stephen Colbert Killed The Late Show
item.description: In Carson’s day, the guests were the stars, and he was the facilitator. In Colbert’s, this successful formula was inverted.
